name: BLOCK GAME!!!
description:
HOW TO PLAY: You only use A and D to move left and right and boom that's game. 

INFO: CUBE GAME!!! is an old project I made while learning game development from the old Brackey's series (Rip Brackey's you will be missed) but I found this old project and decided to finish it kinda. It only took me less than a  day to finish and only has the three levels. Maybe if people would like more I can make more levels, environments,  maybe even new mechanics and make it available on mobile but only time will tell. Hope I gave you at least two mins of enjoyment and may luck be with your side!
